name: Cake Bash
detailed_description:
Cake Bash is a manic party game for up to four players, where the goal is to make yourself as irresistible as possible. Cover yourself in chocolate, jelly beans and all manner of sugar-studded goodies to become the tastiest cake, but watch out – your rivals will do anything to stop you, whether it's by clouting you with a spork, knocking you into pigeon poop, or covering you in all manner of gunk!

Up To Four Pudding-Lovin' Players

Play with up to four players locally, online or battle with some well-baked bots!

Sweet and Simple To Play

With a simple three-button control scheme, any cake fan can play, but don't be deceived – with charged uppercuts, dashes and weapons added into the fray, there's plenty of room to... prove... yourself!

Multiple Indulgent Modes

Whether you're taking on your frosted foes toe-to-toe in “Get Tasty”, or trying to fill that flavoursome flan in “Fruity Clafoutis”, there's a mode for any glucose-guzzlin' gamer!

A Dentist-Angering Assortment Of Characters and Arenas

Play as your favourite cake in a variety of tasty levels! You can finally boast to all your friends, "I played as a slice of chocolate fudge cake who lost all its figs to a furious hermit crab."


So, grab your friends, your acquaintances, some tasty snacks... and get ready for a Cake Bash!

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 550 or equivalent

  • Storage: 800 MB available space
